title: Bootstrap ?
content: What should we bring for bootstrap ?

comments.body: I have a doubt , why does the bootstrap undertaking have 2021 as the year . Are we supposed to fill it out and bring it tomorrow ? Even the dates are wrong in it
The worst part is they didn't mention at which time it ends..
Isn't that a bit much ? 8 to 5 ?
Includes 2 breaks in between. Don't worry
A notebook, pen ,water and lunch should be sufficient

They said lunch and snacks will be provided though ? 
Ig a water bottle will be enough
lunch and snacks will be provided only for the community service thing (painting schools and stuff) , not fo the other events .
